complaints.title: Complaints
complaints.descr: If you were deceived by the broker, or you noticed the fact of fraud, please describe the situation, attach screenshots (if any), a link to the site, and send it to us. We will immediately investigate and publish information about the scammers.

course.title: Training courses
course.descr1: Here you can find training courses in various fields. These courses are purchased from TOP authors, and have been fully tested by our team.
course.descr2: We are like Robin Hood, we bought courses for a lot of money, and now we give them to you, almost for free. We want everyone to be able allow yourself to master modern trends.
course.whyBest: Why is this course the best?
course.freeDescr: Our team offers everything for free to its users.The symbolic course fee is support for the existence and operation of the site. Thanks to each of you. Thanks to your support, the number of useful courses on our site is increasing.
course.purchase: To purchase courses, please contact us.
